name: Administrative Time
description: Time spent on: - Planning and preparation for non-project related meetings, performance assessments and managerial tasks - Attendance of non-project related meetings (e.g. section, department and company meetings) - Email clean-up - Help Desk communication regarding your own hardware, software, and virus issues

name: Company Benefit Time
description: ONLY ERIE Employees can charge time to this. Time spent: - Blood donation - Bereavement - Jury Duty - LTD/STD/Family Leave - Sick Leave - Vacation - Break Time - Holiday Time - Approved ERIE Service Corps Activities (max. 7.5 hrs./yr.)

name: Non-Project Related Education
description: ONLY ERIE Employees can charge time to this. Times spent: - Classes, conferences, and seminars - Corporate Education - Learning new software/techniques - SkillSoft - Webinars Note: Travel time is not to be entered on timesheets

name: Administrative Time
description: Time spent: FTE: - General Knowledge Transfer - Mentoring / training a new employee or intern - Employee or intern being trained - Orientation of Augmented Staff Contractor: - Time spent to come up to speed with their assignment(s). Maximum time is 40 hours within the first week. Benefits: IT
